resources.string: In this mode, it is possible to identify planes in the environment that will be marked by white dots. Clicking on the arrow, at the bottom of the screen, you can choose the 3D model and enter it in the environment by pressing on an identified plane on the screen. At the top left of the screen there is a switch to shift to delete mode, that allows you to delete objects previously placed on the plane by touching them on the screen.

In this mode it is possible to display the 3D models of the images of the planets, found in the gallery. With the button GALLERY it is possible to display and share the images with other devices. To display a 3D model, you have to frame an image of the gallery from another device and wait for it to be detected. to reset the environment and the 3D models, press the button CLEAR at the top left of the screen.

This application has two modes\:
 	\- Plane Detection\: ARCore detects the planes in the surrounding environment, where it is possible to place virtual objects.
 	\- Augmented Images\: ARCore detects images of the planets of the solar system and creates corresponding 3D models in the augmented reality.
 
 In each mode it is possible to find additional information on how to use them.
The application will be brought back to default settings.
